meta.title: Dominik Raducki - Frontend Developer
meta.description: Developer with 3.5 years of experience specializing in Vue, Nuxt, and Drupal. Explore my commercial projects and skill set.

aside.specialization: Specialist in Vue, Nuxt, and Drupal technologies

about.title: Frontend
about.description: Hi! I'm a developer with over 3.5 years of experience in building scalable web applications. While my core expertise lies within the Vue and Nuxt (3/4) ecosystem, I bridge the gap between modern frontend and solid backend foundations (PHP, Node.js) and CMS systems (Headless Drupal). From advanced IoT dashboards and insurance systems to AI-powered tools – I focus on delivering solutions that are performant, fully typed, and UX-optimized.

skills.title: My
skills.description: My experience covers building advanced interfaces, API integrations, and Enterprise-class systems. Here are the technologies I excel in:

items.vue: Vue 3 (Composition API) / Vue 2 (Options API), Vue Router – building reusable architectures and advanced composables.
items.nuxt: Nuxt 3/4 – hybrid rendering (SSR/SSG), Core Web Vitals optimization, and ecosystem modules.
items.typescript: TypeScript – creating fully typed, secure code for complex frontend projects.
items.html: Semantic HTML5 (+ Twig, Blade) & A11y – focusing on accessibility and document structure for SEO purposes.
items.css: Modern CSS – advanced Responsive Design using Grid, Flexbox, and SCSS preprocessor.
items.tailwind: Tailwind CSS – designing consistent visual systems based on Utility-First CSS.
items.gsap: GSAP – creating smooth web animations and interactive interface elements.
items.php: PHP – supporting backend architecture, building API endpoints, and server-side logic.
items.drupal: Drupal – integrating Enterprise CMS with modern frontend and building custom modules.
items.api: API & AI – REST/GraphQL integrations and implementing generative AI solutions (OpenAI).
items.other_ui: UI Frameworks – proficiency in shadcn-vue, Nuxt UI, PrimeVue, and Vuetify.
items.git: Git – version control and collaboration in GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket environments.
items.jira: Agile & CI/CD – working in Scrum, managing Jenkins pipelines, and technical documentation.
items.prisma: Prisma ORM – database modeling and data layer management in Node.js projects.
items.vite: Vite – build process optimization (bundling) and development environment configuration.
items.docker: Docker – application containerization and working within unified deployment environments.

projects.title: Selected
projects.description: A showcase of commercial projects for market leaders and custom fullstack solutions:

link4.description: A comprehensive insurance portal for one of Poland's industry leaders. As a fullstack developer (frontend-focused), I was responsible for implementing custom Vue 3 modules and integrating the presentation layer with the Drupal engine in a Docker environment.

enea.description: Official information and service portal for Enea Operator. I developed the platform in a fullstack model, creating efficient Vue 3 and Tailwind components while ensuring full responsiveness and corporate standards compliance.

mooveno.description: A modern mobility platform offering car-sharing and fleet management services. I was responsible for the frontend layer, including GSAP animations and custom interactive solutions integrated with a backend CMS.

hti.description: A specialized industry portal for the HTI Group, supporting logistics and sales processes. I performed fullstack tasks, building flexible Vue 3 and Vite interfaces that significantly improved the end-user experience.

cards.description: A custom, multi-purpose game card management panel with an advanced authorization and permissions system. I handled the project from the conceptual phase and client consultations to the full production deployment.

iot.description: An advanced dashboard for real-time monitoring and visualization of IoT device data. I independently delivered the solution from A to Z, focusing on data security, session stability, and intuitive chart presentation.

homestay.description: A commercial booking platform for luxury apartments. I designed and implemented a complete system including an interactive availability calendar, booking module, and integrated contact forms.

rooms.description: A complex real estate marketplace platform, my most extensive private project. The system handles the full listing lifecycle: from advanced user panels and authentication to automated email notifications and Prisma database integration.

aipplied.description: An innovative tool supporting HR processes through Artificial Intelligence. I implemented the full application architecture along with OpenAI API integration to automatically generate personalized recruitment questions based on submitted data.

seats.description: An intelligent PKP Intercity ticket search engine, solving the problem of seat unavailability on long routes. The app uses a clever route-splitting algorithm and integrates with external data to find available seat combinations.

drinks.description: A dynamic landing page for a beverage brand, designed with a focus on modern aesthetics and conversion. The project features high performance, polished typography, and smooth section transitions.

candles.description: A stylish product page for a candle manufacturer, blending artisanal aesthetics with modern Web Performance standards. I focused on visual layer optimization (SCSS) and fast load times.
